body: I'm thinkin by the end she's gonna find the pokemon card he dropped and they'll meet up again. Also I like that she kept such a huge secret from everyone for years but decided the moment they hit the beach to randomly tell a nigga from class who she knows very little about instead of her friends. Also her bf knows about the step-dad but is ignoring it which is very whacky. Now we just gotta wait for the two bullies to show up again and the story can really get movin.

What else can we call her but a dumb slut? The girl is abused by her stepdad and the one she confides to is not her boyfriend which she's supposed to be close to but his "best friend", which later rapes her, all the while leaving the boyfriend in the dark.

I honestly don't know what is the desire of hentai authors to make their characters suffer so gratuitously. Additionally, the comments here make me laugh a bit, no translation is needed to realize that the FMC doesn't like the situation (practically all the characters force her to have sex, stepfather, her friends and even her boyfriend) and still, they call her a bitch or slut....Funny
Not my time but just wanted to mention: the cover art gives me the vibes of a doujin aimed for girls
Nice Nice! Someone should  translate this series
